snippet.title: Twelve Minutes – Official Date Announce Trailer – Xbox & Bethesda Games Showcase 2021
snippet.description:
Twelve Minutes is coming Xbox console & day one to Xbox Game Pass on console, PC, and cloud on August 19, 2021.

An interactive thriller about a man trapped in a time loop. Featuring James McAvoy, Daisy Ridley, and Willem Dafoe.
 
Subscribe to Xbox 🎮 https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR
 
Follow Xbox in other channels:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Xbox
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/Xbox
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Xbox

Follow Xbox Game Pass:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/XboxGamePass
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/xboxgamepass

Follow Annapurna Interactive:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/A_i
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/annapurnainteractive/
